The video was created by a digital artis: zozi009, and was not a genuine clip of an Amazon blimp releasing delivery drones.
The artist stated on Twitter that the Lo: 791, an experimental hybrid airship, inspired her design of the Amazon blimp.
While the video may be a digital creatio: Amazon has been working on developing delivery drones, as confirmed by Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos. However, widespread deliveries by drone are not yet a reality.
